rules.text: You must be 13 years of age or older to hold an account on Darkfriend Social.
Show respect. Treat others with kindness, respect, dignity, and patience.
Do not harass others. Read the Code of Conduct for a description of what we consider to be harassment.
Do not post or boost NSFW content without Content Warnings / Sensitive Content setting.
Do not post or boost illegal material. This includes copyrighted materials which you are not licensed to share.
Do not post advertisements or promotions. Read the Code of Conduct for a description of what we consider to be advertisements.
Hide spoilers and leaks behind Content Warnings.

records.text: I've come to detest the rubberized texture used on so many devices. It's nice when new, but after a few years it turns into a tacky, gooey mess. I've tried cleaning w/soap & water (doesn't help) and alcohol (makes it worse.) I can't touch my game controller without it leaving black tar on my hands. So I had to replace it.SNES controller was peak design for my small hands, and I found one that also has joysticks for games that need them. Upgrade! Nice! #gaming
